entries.concepts_covered: JS Dot Notation & Bracket Notation & Functions
entries.journal_entry: It was tough for me to pick up on the functions, need to work on them a lot more
API's look to be really tough, but seem to be really useful moving forward

User input will be a very useful tool going forward to make the apps more usable. Seems difficult and challenging to know with everything else we have learned throughtout the week.  Need to practice a lot more
Event listeners are going to be a good tool for getting data.  Never knew it took so much code to click on a button and make it do something
